name: AVCaption.TextAlignment
desc: Text alignment options for a caption.

items.name: case start
items.desc: An alignment of the text to the start of the inline progression direction.

items.name: case end
items.desc: An alignment of the text to the end of the inline progression direction.

items.name: case center
items.desc: An alignment of the text to the center of the display.

items.name: case left
items.desc: An alignment of the text to the left in horizontal writing mode, and top in vertical writing mode.

items.name: case right
items.desc: An alignment of the text to the right in horizontal writing mode, and bottom in vertical writing mode.
